note:
Downloaded first file in 1981. It wasn't called the Internet back then. I have worked in digital and analog tech including automechanics since 1975. Primary focus was on music. I'm the world's most uncredited recording engineer/analog synthesist. Had large followings on FaceF*ck and Twitter, but jumped ship like a wet rat after I learned the truth. Looking forward to being a Mastodonian.

BTW. My name has nothing to do with Bitcoin.
